text: Mark Funkhouser (born October 4, 1949) is an American author and politician. He was the 53rd mayor of Kansas City, Missouri from May 1, 2007 until May 2, 2011. He was the Kansas City's city auditor. He is the publisher of Governing magazine. He is also the author of the blog, "Bring on the Funk, and the book, Honest, Competent Government: The Promise of Performance Auditing. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Kansas City, Missouri Category:American political writers Category:Politicians from West Virginia Category:Writers from West Virginia Category:Writers from Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Funkhouser
